text: Arau sihamte drrhatara saite allahara sapata kha'i kaichila ye, sihamtara ocaralai yadi kono satarkarai ahe tente sihamte ana sampradayabilakara tulanata adhika anugatyarae satpatha anusarana karaiba; kintu yetiya sihamtara ocarata satarkakarai ahila, tetiya seya kerala sihamtara bimukhata arau duratbahe brd'dhi karaile
